title: Pork BBQ
directions: Place roast in a slow cooker/crock-pot with water.
Cook for 7 hours on low (may vary slightly with your crock-pot) or until meat
Shred meat with forks, discarding any fat.
Strain liquid, and return liquid and pork to crock-pot.
Add next 5 ingredients and stir well.
Cook for 1 addn hour on low.
ingredients: 1 18-oz bottle of favorite barbecue sauce (I like Sweet Baby Ray’s)
